titles.title: I Will Rejoice In You And Be Glad

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will rejoice in You and be glad,
I will extol Your love more than wine;
Draw me after You and let us run together,
I will rejoice in You and be glad!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
More than when the grain and the new wine abound,
Thou hast put gladness in my heart;
More than when the grain and the new wine abound,
Thou hast put gladness in my heart.
Lift up the light of Thy countenance upon us, O Lord,
Lift up the light of Thy countenance upon us, O Lord.
